name: Bunny's Dice Hop
description:
Bunny was going exploring, but now she's gotten lost in this huge castle! Help Bunny by using her special dice roll ability to create pip blocks she can use to hop through portals in her search for the exit.

Basic Controls:

  • A = Move left
  • D = Move right
  • Right - click = Jump
  • Hold Right - click = Higher jump

Dice Ability Controls:

  • Just left - click on any of the Dice UI buttons in-game to spawn platforms based on the faces of a six-sided die.

Your goal:

Avoid:

Credits:

  • Music  and sound: Chris Logsdon's Ambient Music Package
  • Everything else: Me.
